title: Amy Hart wears pink crop top and mini skirt at fashion launch party
text:
She been making the most of her newfound fame following her Love Island stint, often attending glitzy showbiz events.

And Amy Hart was at it again on Thursday as she stepped out clad in a pink crop top and coordinating mini skirt to attend the Meggan Grubb X In The Style Launch Party at Lost Society in Battersea, London.

The blonde beauty, 27, flaunted her slim frame in the skimpy matching set as she struck a series of sultry poses for a photographer.

Wow! Amy Hart, 27, was clad in a pink crop top and coordinating mini skirt to attend the Meggan Grubb X In The Style Launch Party at Lost Society in Battersea, London on Thursday

Amy displayed her toned abs in the skimpy ensemble, and put on a leggy display with perspex heels boosting her height.

Her platinum tresses were styled into a sleek side-parting, while she coated her face in a layer of glam make-up and accessorised with statement earrings.

Earlier in the evening, the reality star put on a very stylish display at the London Dungeon Halloween launch event.

The former air hostess donned a chic knitted jumper dress and black thigh-high boots at the star-studded event, which also saw her lark around in a coffin.

Beauty: Her platinum tresses were styled into a sleek side-parting, while she coated her face in a layer of glam make-up and accessorised with statement earrings

Showcasing her fab sense of fashion, Amy looked effortlessly chic in the tan and white knitwear, of which she draped over a black leather jacket.

Keeping her essentials at hand, the reality star also wore a black, leather bum bag around her waist and accessorised with pearl, heart-shaped earrings.

Amy was joined by a slew of other reality stars and famous faces at the event including TOWIE beauties Chloe Ross, Kelsey Stratford and Ella Wise.

While Ella kept things casual in jeans, both Chloe and Kelsey vamped things up with skintight leather trousers.

Meanwhile, Strictly Come Dancing stars took a break from their gruelling training to enjoy some fun at the event.

The pair were full of joy as they larked around in the coffin and happily posed for pictures.

I'm A Celebrity contestant Amy Willerton was also in attendance, cutting a chic figure in a black dress, tweed blazer and a silk scarf.

Elsewhere, Victoria Clay made a sizzling appearance in a form-fitting red halterneck gown and tan heels.

While Tallia Storm ensured she was the centre of attention by rocking up in a barbie pink trouser suit and matching fluffy slippers.

Amy's outing comes after revealing she would 'get into bed at lunchtime and cry' following her TV stint in a new interview.

Hell for leather: TOWIE beauties Chloe and Kelsey vamped things up with skintight leather trousers

Keeping it casual: Ella Wise teamed her fluffy blue coat with blue skinny jeans and monochrome trainers

Strictly horrifying: Meanwhile, Strictly Come Dancing stars took a break from their gruelling training to enjoy some fun at the event

Amy recently discussed a low moment of her life as she revealed she would 'cry her eyes out' during her unsuccessful quest for love over the summer.

On the ITV2 dating series, the former beauty pageant queen was left heartbroken when her 'half-boyfriend' Curtis, 23, expressed his doubts over their relationship while she visited Casa Amor.

In an interview with Closer magazine, the blonde beauty said: 'I had my heart put in a blender. I used to get into bed at lunchtime and cry my eyes out... I wouldn't have been in a fit state to have met anyone.'

Hair-raising: The pair were full of joy as they larked around in the coffin and happily posed for pictures

Glam arrivals: I'm A Celebrity contestant Amy Willerton cut a chic figure in a black dress, tweed blazer and a silk scarf, while Victoria Clay flashed the flesh in a form-fitting red dress

After leaving the show prematurely, dancer Curtis embarked on a romance with model Maura Higgins, 28.

Although she was crushed over their relationship at the time, Amy has since insisted she wishes the loved-up pair all the best.

The blonde beauty added: 'They obviously make each other very happy, so I'm happy for them.'
